settings.heading: Fresh & Healthy
settings.row_content: Our food is made from only fresh and natural ingredients and does not contain preservatives or artificial colorings. It is hypoallergenic, produced without added grains, and rich in Omega-3. Our freshness-preserving packaging maintains the nutritional benefits of the food components and ensures quality preservation

settings.heading: Delicious
settings.row_content: Our food contains ingredients that pets love. Made with natural protein as the main component, without the use of processed flours. Our packaging preserves the freshness and taste of the food, ensuring that your pet gets excited for every meal.

settings.heading: Convenient
settings.row_content: The daily packaging is convenient for storage and transport, preventing odors and mess in the house, and it does not attract pests. The precise amount in the daily package makes it easy to measure food for each meal.

settings.heading: Eco-friendly
settings.row_content: Our daily packaging is made from recycled materials, weighs less than traditional food bags, and the production process of the packaging leaves a smaller carbon footprint compared to the production of food bags.

settings.heading: How are the portions calculated?
settings.row_content: Daily food portions are calculated based on the nutritional needs corresponding to the pet's life stage and other characteristics. It's important to evaluate the number of calories (the energy the food provides) rather than the portion size. For example, the average calorie burn for a 55 lbs dog is about 950 calories per day (depending on physical activity level, age, and physical condition), and the recommended portion is determined accordingly. The amount is a nutritional recommendation, and adjustments should be made by monitoring your dog's weight and appetite.

settings.heading: How is it recommended to transition to Mills food?
settings.row_content: Mills offers the option to purchase a tasting pack to explore the variety of flavors and assess your pet's preferences. After selecting the preferred food type and flavor, you can purchase a two-week trial pack and gradually transition your pet to a diet exclusively based on our excellent food. Once the gradual transition is complete, you can place regular orders from our website.

settings.heading: My pet didn't like any flavor, what should I do?
settings.row_content: Try again, and if no match is found, we will refund you‚Äîsadly but with love.

settings.heading: I placed an order, when will I receive it?
settings.row_content: Our Daily Packs are prodused only after the order is placed to ensure maximum freshness, and we do our best to deliver the order in the shortest possible time. We guarantee a delivery time of up to 5 business days.
